Vercel Authentication

headers.content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://vercel.live; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; object-src 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests
headers.permissions-policy: camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(), payment=(self), usb=(), bluetooth=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=(), accelerometer=(), autoplay=(), encrypted-media=(), fullscreen=(self), picture-in-picture=()

Legal & Financial Help by Law Students

We guide you to the right solution for your situation

Get educational guidance from law students studying LLB at a top London university using up-to-date information from Gov.UK, FCA, and ombudsman services. When you need professional representation, we connect you with verified solicitors and legal professionals from our specialist network.

Quick assessments to understand your situation

Am I Eligible?

Quick questionnaire to check if you have a valid claim for bank refunds, compensation, or disputes.

✓ Free • ✓ 2 minutes • ✓ No signup required

Refund Calculator

Estimate potential refunds for bank charges, PPI, packaged accounts, and other financial services.

✓ Free • ✓ Instant results • ✓ Based on FCA data

Next Steps Guide

Personalized action plan showing exactly what to do next and which forms to complete.

✓ Free basics • ✓ Upgrade for full plan

Choose Your Level of Support

Start free, upgrade when you need more guidance

Free Explorer

£0

Full Access

£9.99/month

Everything you need to succeed

  • All claim types (25+ covered)
  • Advanced assessment tools
  • Custom dashboard & tracking
  • Unlimited saves & bookmarks
  • Real-time alerts & updates
  • Priority support from students

  • Verified solicitor referrals when needed

See Our Guided Assessment in Action

Step-by-step guidance to understand your options

Progress Step 2 of 5

Tell us about your banking situation

This helps us understand what type of claim you might have. All information is confidential and used for educational purposes only.

Upgrade for full assessment: Get detailed analysis, evidence requirements, and step-by-step action plan

When You Need Professional Legal Representation

Access our network of verified solicitors and legal professionals matched to your specific claim

Verified Specialists

All solicitors in our network are SRA-regulated and specialize in financial services law, banking disputes, and consumer rights.

✓ SRA Regulated ✓ Specialist Experience ✓ Track Record Verified

Claim-Matched Referrals

We match you with legal professionals who have specific experience in your type of claim - banking charges, PPI, investment advice, or regulatory issues.

✓ Targeted Expertise ✓ Relevant Experience ✓ Success Rate Data

Seamless Connection

Your case assessment and documentation transfer directly to your chosen solicitor, so you don't have to start from scratch.

✓ Case Continuity ✓ Documentation Transfer ✓ Warm Introduction

How Our Professional Referral Works

We don't just point you to a directory - we provide intelligent matching and warm introductions

1

Assessment Complete

You've used our tools to understand your case and options

2

Professional Match

We match you with 2-3 specialists in your claim type

3

Warm Introduction

Your case details and research transfer directly to them

4

Professional Representation

You choose your solicitor and move forward with confidence

Why This Approach Works Better

Instead of cold-calling random solicitors, you arrive with your case already researched and documented. This means better initial consultations, more accurate fee estimates, and faster progress on your claim.

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of people getting help from law students with their financial disputes

No cost to start • Educational guidance only • Moderated by law students

Important Educational Notice

This platform is operated by law students studying LLB (Bachelor of Laws) at a top London university for educational purposes. We help you understand your rights, explore your options, and find the right pathway forward for your situation. When you need professional legal representation, we connect you with qualified solicitors who specialize in your area.

JuriBank

Legal and financial help by law students. Educational guidance to help you understand your options and connect you with verified legal professionals when needed.
